cover.alt: Technoskepticism book cover. A surreal, blurred, abstract greyscale image, possible a photo collage, is at the bottom of the cover, under a light blue sky.
You Deserve a Tech Union book cover. A Book Apart's signature stark design, with a white band at the top, the rest of the cover bright red. Inside a black circle is the number 47.
The Intelligence Illusion book cover. A stylised, geometrically-sketched figure looks off the page to the upper-left, against a black background.

Imagination book cover. A Black woman wears a calm expression, her hair braided into loops and coils, and decorated with flowers. She has an ornate high-necked, beaded, floral garment, and she is surrounded by clouds of light blue fabric.

World Wide Waste cover. An abstract dotted world map leaks black oily drips downwards, filling up the bottom of the white page. The subtitle reads 'How digital is killing our planet - and what we can do about it'.
Simple Sabotage Field Manual cover. The text is printed in black on a blue background. The  word 'secret' at both the top and bottom of the page have been redacted with a black marker.
How to Do Nothing book cover. The title is in white, partially obscured by a bed of pink and white flowers covering the background. The subtitle reads, 'Resisting the Attention Economy'.
Ghost Station book cover. A figure wearing a spacesuit walks across an abandoned room, with empty spacesuits hanging on the wall. A couple of drops of blood are on the floor in the foreground.
The Mikado Method book cover. An illustration of Japanese Emperor Seiwa sitting cross-legged in white clothes against a yellow-ochre background.
System Collapse cover. The Murderbot character crouches in a field of crops, towered over by a gigantic many-limbed bot.

author: Ben West

cover.alt: This Book Could Save Your Life book cover. The title is in white on a plain black background. The subtitle, 'Breaking the silence around the mental health emergency' is in black text on an orange strip at the top.

title: This Book Could Save Your Life

cover.alt: Among the Trolls book cover. A white woman with long brown hair sits nonchalantly among various exasperated, angry, and yelling people.

author: Danny Caine

cover.alt: How to Resist Amazon and Why cover. A turquoise fist is raised in defiance clutching a scrap of paper against a bright yellow background. The word Amazon in the title has the iconic Amazon arrow downturned into a sort of sad face.

title: How to Resist Amazon and Why
